title: add transforms to DataLoader
body_html:
Could it be a good idea to add 'transforms' argument directly into torch.utils.data.DataLoader .
Something like :
torch.utils.data.DataLoader(dataset, batch_size=opt.batchSize, transforms=transforms.Normalize(), shuffle=True, num_workers=int(opt.workers))

It could be useful for inverting axis and feed the data to RNN.
